measure.name: all_economizer_damper_stuck_fault_scheduled
measure.display_name: All faulted damper in an economizer
measure.description: This Measure simulates the effect of a damper in an economizer getting stuck at a fixed position during certain period in the year to the performance of the building.
measure.modeler_description: The user of this Measure should choose the economizer getting faulted, the period that it is faulted and the damper position when the damper is stuck. If a schedule of fault prevalence is not given, the model will apply the fault to the entire simulation. The fixed damper position is described by a ratio of the outdoor airflow rate to the supply air duct.

argument.name: econ_choice
argument.display_name: Choice of economizers. If you want to impose the fault on all economizers, choose * ALL Controller:OutdoorAir *

argument.name: schedule_exist
argument.display_name: Check if a schedule of fault presence is needed, or uncheck to apply the fault for the entire simulation.

argument.name: damper_pos
argument.display_name: The position of damper indicated between 0 and 1. If it is -1 and a schedule of fault prevalence is not given, the fault model will not be imposed to the building simulation without warning.
